title: Bug 104630: Column icons missing when connecting to Derby database
OB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons do not show up.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new project. 2. Create a new report. 3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source to connect to a Derby database using the following settings: Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui User Name: root Password: root 4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset. 5. In the Edit Data Set window, select Query. 6.
